title: HG Skis
description:
I have worked with HG Skis since 2012. I started as a video intern and am now the creative director of the company, self-producing a majority of their media and artwork. I lead a rebrand of the company that was fully launched by the 2014/15 season, while producing our full length urban ski film that was accepted to the International Freeski Film Festival. Since I have come on board, HG Skis has grown from a local favorite, to one of the up and coming craft ski brands of North America. Visit HGâ€™s website and social media pages to view more:

  • hgskis.com
  • vimeo.com/hgskis
  • facebook.com/hgskis
  • instagram.com/hgskis

title: McIntyre Golf Company
description: Working with an upper level designer, and team of marketers at Brandthropology, I helped design the packaging for McIntyre's vintage replica golf balls. The packaging was applied over six varieties of balls, and three sizes. I was responsible for the photography of the 12-ball gift box and 3-ball sleeve packages.

title: Hickock & Boardman
description: I worked with Hickock & Boardman to design one-sheets that describe their resources to customers, as well as a branded folder to contain them. Using their established brand guidelines, I created a clean, hierarchy minded layout, that heavily implemented their colors to draw attention and build originality. We extended this new branding style to a postcard that was used as an invitation to their client appreciation night at Shelburne Farms.

title: Winter Garden
description:
Winter Garden is the result of a semester long thesis project comparing freestyle skiing & snowboarding to more publicly accepted sports like skateboarding. The mission of Winter Garden is to identify the need for an outlet within cities and towns for park skiing and riding. The final result would be done through the combination of public art pieces and park style features, publicly available in the same way a skatepark typically is. This would eliminate the need to take down the park in off season months.

The poster is a public invitation to the opening event at a hypothetical location in Burlington, Vermont. The booklet would act as a means of proposing the project to a new city with the aim of raising funding. The handmade process book covered all parts of the project from idea development and sketching, to final outcomes.

title: Lucci
description: I was hired to both brand and design packaging for Lucci, a rolling paper company offering the first ever "inside-out" paper. Lucci, the "professional way to roll", represents the simplicity of the inside out rolling technique, and its branding is equally modest.

title: City Market Illustration
description: An illustration for City Market, a co-op grocery store located in Burlington, Vermont. The artwork was screen printed on T Shirts that were sold in their store.

title: Northpull Winch Company
description: I worked with Northpull Winch Company and HG Skis to create both static and short video advertisements displaying the winches ability to tow skiers into urban features. The ads were featured on Newschoolers.com.

title: Dais Visual Culture Mag
description: Dais magazine is a concept mag created with the intent of featuring talented skiers, snowboarders, skaters, artists and the unusual cultures created by these folk. the term dais comes from its definition of being a raised platform, such as one used by a speaker. The magazine would be a dais for visually displaying the abstract culture of action sports and artists. The photography in this concept is the work of mine and others.

title: Laced Shoe Stringers
description: Laced is aimed to apply branding to a typically unbranded item: shoelaces. Hinting at youth culture, and action sports, Laced as a project provided outlets for me to incorporate my skills in photography with my designs.

title: Motion Reel
description: A collection of animations created for various clients and projects.

sections.title: Animations
vimeoEmbeds: <iframe src='//player.vimeo.com/video/93394040' width='500' height='281' frameborder='0' webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

title: 5 to 9 Ski Film
description: 5 to 9 is a film recapping the HG Skis team's 2014 season filming in the streets of the east coast. This 21 minute film was accepted into and premiered at the International Freeski Film Festival in Montreal, Canada. It was later premiered in Burlington, Vermont before its online release. The film was voted favorite film from the IF3 festival in a public poll on newschoolers.com, a popular freeskiing website. I was the main cinematographer, editor, designer, and overall producer of the film.

title: Aurora Ski Film
description: Aurora is a film recapping the HG Skis team's 2013 season filming in the streets. This 12 minute film was premiered in Burlington, VT, and Dever, CO in collaboration with Level 1 Production film, Partly Cloudy.

title: Stray Travel
description: A short promotional video I made for Stray Travel New Zealand showcasing a passengers experience on their bus tours. The video was filmed over a week of traveling down the west coast of the south island.

title: Artist Profile: Castle
description: I met up with Castle during my 5 month study in Wellington, New Zealand. Coming from South Africa, Ivan has an interesting background that forms his perspectives and pieces to be unlike any I've really seen before. There is a great array of graffiti style artwork in the area, and much of it coming from his crew, Pirates. It was great to get to talk and paint with an artist of the area and see how perspectives on art like this change country to country.
